reshape and remold.desc: Successful procs of Scrapsinger will increase the amount of armor damage your opponent takes. After hitting 10 stacks, the opponent will take +5% damage until the stacks drop below 10.

reqs.from: Gilded Path: Scrapsinger, Refine and Reuse, Artisan's Blade, Songs Unforged, Masterwork

masterwork.name: Masterwork
masterwork.desc: Successful hits from Artisan Blades will proc metal rods and deal 50% more damage.

artisan's blade.name: Artisan's Blade
artisan's blade.desc: Activating Scrapsinger forges a metal blade behind you for every 2 rods you consume. Metal blades will fire at a target upon landing an ironsing or metal infused attack.

gilded path: scrapsinger.name: Gilded Path: Scrapsinger
gilded path: scrapsinger.desc: Flourishing an enemy consumes any rods they have and siphones their armor to you per rod.

refine and reuse.name: Refine and Reuse
refine and reuse.desc: Consuming rods with Scrapsinger reduces incoming PEN against you for 14 seconds. Each rod reduces PEN by 5% multiplicatively.

songs unforged.name: Songs Unforged
songs unforged.desc: Your weapon criticals will now activate Scrapsinger

jumpstart.name: Jumpstart
jumpstart.desc: Using Static Withdraw when not being carried applies Jumpstart, increasing your ability to scale walls, your speed and applies shock to all outgoing physical damage and damage taken. Grants a +10% damage multiplier.

raging static.name: Raging Static
raging static.desc: Your Jumpstart no longer gives you movement buffs, but your outgoing physical damage is increased up to 20%. The self damage to activate it is lowered. Your cooldown on Jumpstart is also lowered.

gruesome harvest.name: Gruesome Harvest
gruesome harvest.desc: Landing Bloodrend mantras on opponents with over 70% blood poison will give you slight temporary health.

panacea.name: Panacea
panacea.desc: Hitting an enemy with a Bloodrend mantra stops their blood poison from decaying briefly.

hemolysis.name: Hemolysis
hemolysis.desc: Deal 20% more critical attack damage to opponents with over 25% blood poisoning.

hemolytic transfusion.name: Hemolytic Transfusion
hemolytic transfusion.desc: Guardbreaking an enemy with a Bloodrend mantra increases the amount of blood poison from the attack.

juicy snack.name: Juicy Snack
juicy snack.desc: Eliminating enemies returns their amount of blood poision as health to you.

tainted ground.name: Tainted Ground
tainted ground.desc: Enemies who stand in blood pools will not decay blood poison.

vasculitis.name: Vasculitis
vasculitis.desc: Your opponent cannot proc deep gems if they have over 20% blood poisoning for a brief duration. *Must hit them while they are over 20% BP.)

shadowcast unbounded.name: Shadowcast Unbounded
shadowcast unbounded.desc:
You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your shadowcast to its fullest.
[Note: Falling below 75 Shadowcast revokes this Talent.]

shadow travel.name: Shadow Travel
shadow travel.desc: Teleport to a location in exchange for Ether cost. Certain ranges will require a health sacrifice. Be careful as this technique can prove lethal to the user.

blossoming darkness.name: Blossoming Darkness
blossoming darkness.desc: Ether drained during Shadow Roar increases the size of it.

fear.name: Fear
fear.desc: Enemies that run from you after being hit by your shadows will hang in place briefly.

lasting sorrow.name: Lasting Sorrow
lasting sorrow.desc: Shadow lasts longer on your opponent.

sightless still.name: Sightless Still
sightless still.desc: The more a person is affected by your shadowcast the more you obscure their vision. Block breaking an opponent obscures their vision with darkness more potent than your Shadow mantra.

singularity.name: Singularity
singularity.desc: Enemies will briefly hang in place when hit by a shadow move.

shadowcaster.name: Shadowcaster
shadowcaster.desc: Harnesss the power of Shadow in your mantra crafting.

adept shadowcaster.name: Adept Shadowcaster
adept shadowcaster.desc: You can now obtain 1-Star Leveled Shadowcaster Mantras.

expert shadowcaster.name: Expert Shadowcaster
expert shadowcaster.desc: You can now obtain 2-Star Leveled Shadowcaster Mantras.

master shadowcaster.name: Master Shadowcaster
master shadowcaster.desc: You can now obtain 3-Star Leveled Shadowcaster Mantras.

knight's rally.name: Knight's Rally
knight's rally.desc: When using a shield, you ready your block more quickly after taking a hit.

turtle shell.name: Turtle Shell
turtle shell.desc: If your shield is on your back, take reduced backstab damage and negate Spine Cutter.

emergency repairs.name: Emergency Repairs
emergency repairs.desc: Your repairs are twice as efficient when the ship is on low health. Your repairs scale somewhat with the Max Health of the ship.

spare nails.name: Spare Nails
spare nails.desc: You always keep a couple spare. Your repairs are more efficient and you no longer drop Wood on death.

unnecessary theatrics.name: Unnecessary Theatrics
unnecessary theatrics.desc: Deliver a one-liner on uppercuts, flourishes, and critical attacks that charms your opponents briefly.

a world without song.name: A World Without Song
a world without song.desc: Every 3 hits with a Wind Mantra now procs Suffocate.

silencer's blade.name: Silencer's Blade
silencer's blade.desc: Meleeing a 'Suffocated' opponent will extend the duration of the Suffocation and grant a speed boost.

ankle cutter.name: Ankle Cutter
ankle cutter.desc: You can now do a special ground slash while sliding, applying a temporary speed debuff to those hit, as well as preventing jumping.

dread fighter.name: Dread Fighter
dread fighter.desc: Parrying and getting hit by mantras now give you stacks of Dread. Each stack increases your mantra resistance, up to 25%. Each stack lasts for 15 seconds.

flow state.name: Flow State
flow state.desc: Enter a moment of extreme focus in which you can change the windup of your special attack with the correct timing.

mayhem.name: Mayhem
mayhem.desc: Initiate a special dash attack by pressing M1 during the start of your dodge.

merciless blade.name: Merciless Blade
merciless blade.desc: You now execute enemies much faster.

oath: silentheart.name: Oath: Silentheart
oath: silentheart.desc:
You vow to reject the Words of the Song, denying yourself of mantras in pursuit of your own path to true strength, no matter the cost. You can wield weapons with half the usual requirements.
[Note: Only reduces requirements by 25, not half.]

relentless hunt.name: Relentless Hunt
relentless hunt.desc: M1 while doing an Aerial Attack to initiate a special gap closer attack.

rising star.name: Rising Star
rising star.desc: Press CTRL + M2 to activate a special uppercut attack.

true vantage.name: True Vantage
true vantage.desc: Venting makes you invisible briefly while boosting your speed.

unmatched dexterity.name: Unmatched Dexterity
unmatched dexterity.desc: Press X to Quick Swap between weapons within your toolbar.

vengeful pursuit.name: Vengeful Pursuit
vengeful pursuit.desc: Your running M1's that don't hit send out a special mid-range crescent projectile that slows on hit. Tracks onto those with their backs turned to you. 8s CD.

friends in high places.name: Friends in High Places
friends in high places.desc: Your connections often let you off the hook when you're in trouble with the law. Nepotism sure does pay!

snake oil.name: Snake Oil
snake oil.desc: Okay, the amount you're charging people for your items is downright criminal. But I'm just a talent description, I can't stop you.

golden tongue.name: Golden Tongue
golden tongue.desc: Typing gives a random buff to you and those around you. (60 second cooldown)

oath: soulbreaker.name: Oath: Soulbreaker
oath: soulbreaker.desc: The sum of your fragments is greater than the whole. Though your very being is splintered and threatening to drift apart, every shard of you Vows to remain One. Your Oath is solvent that joins all of your distinct selves into the gestalt you.

formless.name: Formless
formless.desc: Teleport to a location within your Tacet bubble. Receive a slight speed boost when activating Tacet.

heart reverb.name: Heart Reverb
heart reverb.desc: Those picked up by your Rhythm are marked for 8 seconds. Whenever an opponent dodges your attack, detect their rhythm and vigor. You can use Rhythm while standing.

soul infusion.name: Soul Infusion
soul infusion.desc: Infuse Ardour into your executions. If your execute is interrupted, the opponent remains down for a longer amount of time. Your Ardour Screams are projected further.

murmur: ardour [oath].name: Murmur: Ardour [OATH]
murmur: ardour [oath].desc: An application of the Song that enables one to channel the Murmur into raw strength. Press H.

murmur: rhythm [oath].name: Murmur: Rhythm [OATH]
murmur: rhythm [oath].desc: An application of the Song that enables the user to perceive the subtle Murmur emanating from all things. Press G while crouched.

murmur: tacet [oath].name: Murmur: Tacet [OATH]
murmur: tacet [oath].desc: An application of the Song that enables the user to suppress their own murmur. Press T while crouched.

ardour scream [oath].name: Ardour Scream [OATH]
ardour scream [oath].desc: Amplify your shout into a scream using Ardour, dominating weaker foes. Victims take 25% more damage and 50% more posture damage for 10s.

spotter [oath].name: Spotter [OATH]
spotter [oath].desc: Marking enemies while in Rhythm will indicate their health status to your allies.

bloodiron spirit.name: Bloodiron Spirit
bloodiron spirit.desc: You regain some Armor upon killing enemies.

chime of conflict.name: Chime of Conflict
chime of conflict.desc: Drift in and out of reality, challenging those hailing from distant lands. Grants you the ability to access the PvP Arena.

possession.name: Possession
possession.desc: After an apparition hits an enemy, receive 30% posture damage on all Galebreath attacks for 6 seconds. If the apparition hits while you have Phantom Step activated, receive a 15% chip damage buff as well for the same duration.

vanishing wraith.name: Vanishing Wraith
vanishing wraith.desc: Your 'Aerial Attacks' while in Phantom Step will now teleport you behind your target.

apparitions.name: Apparitions
apparitions.desc: Instead of Haunted Gale Phantoms, each proc will now send apparitions towards your enemy. The apparations will apply 'Winded' where 'Suffocation' would suffice. Apparations cannot be parried if you are in 'Phantom Step'.

haunted path: specter.name: Haunted Path: Specter
haunted path: specter.desc: Build up spectral energy by performing successful dodges and landing Wind mantras. Phantom winds from Haunted Gale no longer appear. You can no longer suffocate enemies.

phantom step.name: Phantom Step
phantom step.desc: Press X to begin running at high speeds and your regular dashes transform into gale dashes. (Must have at least 10% Spectral Gauge)

death from above.name: Death From Above
death from above.desc: Upon cancelling your Air Dash, reveal your wings and strike your enemy.

oath: starkindred.name: Oath: Starkindred
oath: starkindred.desc: You vow to feel the knowledge of all that is, all at once. Your heart beats with the world itself, as the Stars above watch over you.

link conduction.name: Link Conduction
link conduction.desc: While you have active tethers your lightning mantras cost less ether.

jumper cables.name: Jumper Cables
jumper cables.desc: Getting knocked with an active tether allows you to steal health from tethered targets and not get knocked.

static ace.name: Static Ace
static ace.desc: Using Lightning Stream with an active tether targets your closest active link.

static allure.name: Static Allure
static allure.desc: Having two active tethers will cause the previous tethered enemy to get magnetized to your newest tethered enemy, also increases the duration of tethers by 15 seconds.

static link.name: Static Link
static link.desc: Flourishing or uppercutting an enemy creates a static link between you and your enemy. Your lightning stuns enemies for 1.5x as long.

storm link.name: Storm Link
storm link.desc: While you have a Static Link on someone, your Wind mantras that hit them are imbued with flashes of Lightning.

grasp on reality.name: Grasp on Reality
grasp on reality.desc: Damage taken from insanity is reduced.

magical resolve.name: Magical Resolve
magical resolve.desc: Being hit increases Ether regen for a short duration.

unfazed.name: Unfazed
unfazed.desc: You are more resilient to the side effects of going insane. You no longer Shiver and you Panic with less severity.

sunset ricochet.name: Sunset Ricochet
sunset ricochet.desc: Your bullets ricochet to a nearby enemy when hitting an opponent.

voltaic conductor.name: Voltaic Conductor
voltaic conductor.desc: Your Thundercall Mantras deal 20% chip damage against enemies with conductor rods.

herbivore.name: Herbivore
herbivore.desc: You gain more nutrition from eating plants.

iron gut.name: Iron Gut
iron gut.desc: You have resistance against being poisoned by foods.

termite.name: Termite
termite.desc: You can eat things most would consider inedible.

dustlunge.name: Dustlunge
dustlunge.desc: You can now assassinate enemies from much farther range, shadestepping to their location if they're too far. You automatically assassinate other nearby enemies.

reqs.from: Lowstride, Lights Out, Deep Wound, Unseen Threat

none left behind.name: None Left Behind
none left behind.desc: You can now shadestep to pick up knocked humanoids far away from you. 4s CD.

punishing blow.name: Punishing Blow
punishing blow.desc: Daze swinging opponents when hitting them with an M1 with a heavy weapon.

foolish outburst.name: Foolish Outburst
foolish outburst.desc: Blocking or parrying a vent will absorb the Tempo cost of the vent. A Tactician steadies the course of battle.

hard read.name: Hard Read
hard read.desc: Hitting your opponent during a feint will cause them to be dazed.

target switch.name: Target Switch
target switch.desc: Parrying an opponent then hitting someone else makes your next mantra free.

water off a duck's back.name: Water off a Duck's Back
water off a duck's back.desc: Venting will shift any elemental status effects affecting you onto those hit by your vent. Will also remove potion splash statuses on vent.

controlled combustion.name: Controlled Combustion
controlled combustion.desc: Your Agitating Spark no longer spreads to your allies. All-Consuming Flame no longer applies against allies.

artisan chef.name: Artisan Chef
artisan chef.desc: The food you cook now becomes Artisan food, increasing it's hunger and thirst gained by +25%.

master chef.name: Master Chef
master chef.desc: Buffs applied by food you cook now have their buffs amplified by +30%.

explosive finish.name: Explosive Finish
explosive finish.desc: If an enemy is on fire when you flourish, blast them away with a fire blast.

flaming flourish.name: Flaming Flourish
flaming flourish.desc: Set enemies on fire when you flourish or uppercut them.

mirage clone.name: Mirage Clone
mirage clone.desc: Successfully dodging leaves a heat mirage clone that sets enemies that swung at you on fire.

emperor flame.name: Emperor Flame
emperor flame.desc: Absorb fire produced by you, once you reach 5 stacks your next attack will be an automatic Explosive Finish flourish.

grasp of eylis.name: Grasp of Eylis
grasp of eylis.desc: You can temporarily teleport to locations near your bounty target, if one can be found. However, you must stay close, or be desynchronised.

voideye.name: Voideye
voideye.desc: Voidmother's blessing, the method to travel back to the Voidheart.

last second negotiations.name: Last Second Negotiations
last second negotiations.desc: Most enemies will hesitate a moment longer before executing you.

another man's trash.name: Another Man's Trash
another man's trash.desc: Take unequipped equipment when mugging a player.

cap artist.name: Cap Artist
cap artist.desc: Pressing [R] while crouching allows you to fake being dead.

master thief.name: Master Thief
master thief.desc: Gain more notes when mugging a player.

pickpocket.name: Pickpocket
pickpocket.desc: Gain the ability to pickpocket by pressing "N" on a downed person.

discharge.name: Discharge
discharge.desc: [Light Weapons] On 5th successfull attack you will discharge static dealing lightning damage to those nearby.

jolt cast.name: Jolt Cast
jolt cast.desc: Every 3 perfect casted lightning mantra builds a stack at 3 stacks your next lightning mantra is instant cast.

rain of static.name: Rain of Static
rain of static.desc: After successfully casting lightning impact, strike down countless thunder at those below. In return your Lightning Impact will require more time to cast.

gathering electricity [agl].name: Gathering Electricity [AGL]
gathering electricity [agl].desc: [Medium Weapons] Reaching 5 Static Blade charges automatically consumes the stacks and applies a lightning buff to your weapon. 60 second cooldown.

gathering electricity [str].name: Gathering Electricity [STR]
gathering electricity [str].desc: [Medium Weapons] Reaching 5 Static Blade charges automatically consumes the stacks and applies a lightning buff to your weapon. 60 second cooldown.

overcharge.name: Overcharge
overcharge.desc: Your next dash after activating Static Blade is enhanced by lightning.

static blade.name: Static Blade
static blade.desc: [Medium Weapons] Hitting blocks or blocking or parrying hits will now generate an electric chage in your blade, granting a small speed buff. Charges can stack up to 5 times.

thundercall unbounded.name: Thundercall Unbounded
thundercall unbounded.desc:
You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your thundercall to its fullest.
[Note: Falling below 75 Thundercall revokes this Talent.]

static fakeout.name: Static Fakeout
static fakeout.desc: Roll cancelling immediately after a parry will cause you to teleport behind your opponent.

discovery of fire.name: Discovery of Fire
discovery of fire.desc: Flints and Flamecharm are for simpletons.

shocking finish.name: Shocking Finish
shocking finish.desc: Following a flourish up with a lightning beam causes it to be casted instantly.

static flash clone.name: Static Flash Clone
static flash clone.desc: When using lightning clones you disappear leaving behind a static clone for a short duration.

static withdraw.name: Static Withdraw
static withdraw.desc: When being carried use this talent to shock your captor, forcing them to drop you. Bodies of knocked enemies will be charged with electricity which will stun people who attempt to carry them.

stratoshock.name: Stratoshock
stratoshock.desc: Your lightning deals an additional 5% damage when in the rain.

thundercaller.name: Thundercaller
thundercaller.desc: Grants you the ability to command Lightning as a Thundercaller.

adept thundercaller.name: Adept Thundercaller
adept thundercaller.desc: You can now obtain 1-star Thundercaller mantras.

expert thundercaller.name: Expert Thundercaller
expert thundercaller.desc: You can now obtain 2-star Thundercaller mantras.

master thundercaller.name: Master Thundercaller
master thundercaller.desc: You can now obtain 3-star Thundercaller mantras.

unbreakable.name: Unbreakable
unbreakable.desc: Reduces the time you spend stunned after being block broken.

manipulator.name: Manipulator
manipulator.desc: Deal 20% more critical attack damage to charmed enemies, but the effect is removed on impact.

narcissist.name: Narcissist
narcissist.desc: Charming an already Charmed opponent Overcharms you briefly. Guess you really were always that great.

sow and mend.name: Sow and Mend
sow and mend.desc: Sacrifice 15% of your blood for temporary health.

cyclical exsanguination.name: Cyclical Exsanguination
cyclical exsanguination.desc: Whenever you deal more than 20 damage to an enemy in an instance, pause your temporary health decay for 3 seconds.

embolism.name: Embolism
embolism.desc: If an enemy is guardbroken while you have temporary health, convert your temporary health into additional damage.

hypovolemic focus.name: Hypovolemic Focus
hypovolemic focus.desc: While you have temporary health, your opponent regains far less posture from parrying you.

cheap shot.name: Cheap Shot
cheap shot.desc: Your attacks gain 10% PEN multiplicatively when you have an active speed boost.

crippling comeuppance.name: Crippling Comeuppance
crippling comeuppance.desc: Landing Revenge puts your opponent's Mobility slot Mantras on CD for 15s. 30s CD.

down comes the claw.name: Down Comes the Claw
down comes the claw.desc: Landing a Critical while you have a speed boost prevents your opponent from being able to dodge twice in a row for 5s.

maiming claws.name: Maiming Claws
maiming claws.desc: Down Comes the Claw now disables your opponents posture regeneration for 3s on proc.

pursuit.name: Pursuit
pursuit.desc: If you land your Revenge, clear the cooldown immediately (25s cooldown).

face cutter.name: Face Cutter
face cutter.desc: [Twinblade] Your Spine Cutter now deals an additional hit.

turning of the wheel.name: Turning of the Wheel
turning of the wheel.desc: [Twinblade] After perfect dodging a swing or critical attack, step backwards and ramp up your swingspeed.

burning sacrifice.name: Burning Sacrifice
burning sacrifice.desc: Sacrifice puppets who have been alive for half of their lifetime and burn purple for Flame Emperor Stacks.

reqs.from: Wraith Path: Twisted Puppets, Emperor Flame

burning puppets.name: Burning Puppets
burning puppets.desc: Your puppets can now inflict burn and fire-based talents when they explode.

explosive rage.name: Explosive Rage
explosive rage.desc: Causing explosions will make your puppets go into a frenzy - speeding up and dealing slightly more damage.

moths to a flame.name: Moths to a Flame
moths to a flame.desc: Your Twisted Puppets now home towards burning enemies.

wraith path: twisted puppets.name: Wraith Path: Twisted Puppets
wraith path: twisted puppets.desc: Your Flamecharm mantras summon puppets of shadow and flame. Your flames are now black.

audacity.name: Audacity
audacity.desc: Once you've brought down your prey, instill fear into all those who would seperate you from claiming it. Charmed or nearby enemes will fear for longer. Nearby allies gain a 10% damage buff (40s).

rule through fear.name: Rule Through Fear
rule through fear.desc: Executing an enemy applies Overcharm to nearby allies and yourself.

no survivors.name: No Survivors
no survivors.desc: Your allies and yourself execute faster while affected by Overcharm.

denial repulse.name: Denial Repulse
denial repulse.desc: You now emit a delayed burst of flames after coming close to death.

undying flame.name: Undying Flame
undying flame.desc: Your flame can be casted in the depths. Standing close to your graceful flame will slowly restore sanity for others in the area.

jetstream.name: Jetstream
jetstream.desc: The favor of the winds is yours: landing three hits (five for light weapons) without taking damage against your opponent envelops you in a shield of wind.

simmerbloom.name: Simmerbloom
simmerbloom.desc: M1's on Pleeksty's Inferno are now granted flames.

umami.name: Umami
umami.desc: Feast on foes with mighty cutlery. Chef Weapons now steal opponents hunger.

grotesque resilience.name: Grotesque Resilience
grotesque resilience.desc:
You take reduced damage from 'Damage over Time' effects. 
[50%, 25% while Flame Within is active.]
[Bleed reduction is 25%.]

battery sapper.name: Battery Sapper
battery sapper.desc: If your Human Battery targets have Ether, it will drain their Ether to help pay for your Mantras. 10s Cd

catalytic strike.name: Catalytic Strike
catalytic strike.desc: Posture breaking an enemy will Overload their Surge stacks.

closed circuit.name: Closed Circuit
closed circuit.desc: Surge Overloads that fail to arc to other opponents will deal additional damage to the Overloaded enemy.

fried circuits.name: Fried Circuits
fried circuits.desc: Overloading an enemy applies Sapped for 5s.

human battery.name: Human Battery
human battery.desc: When you're out of Ether, convert the Surge stacks of nearby enemies into Ether to pay the cost of your Mantras.

surge path: unstable capacitor.name: Surge Path: Unstable Capacitor
surge path: unstable capacitor.desc: Your lightning no longer applies Shock, instead applying Surge. At maximum statics of Surge, your opponents will Overload, sending arcs of lightning in every direction.

air counter.name: Air Counter
air counter.desc: You can now 'Aerial Attack' to catch enemies who have recently jumped in the air above you as an anti-air attack with reduced Light Attack damage. Upon hitting the opponent briefly hinder them.

speed demon.name: Speed Demon
speed demon.desc:
Your attacks now inflict a reduced-strength bleed while you have a speed boost. 1s cooldown.
[Normal bleed is 30%, this is 15%.]

action surge.name: Action Surge
action surge.desc: Adrenaline Surge now increases your swing speed by 0.04s for its duration.

bear trap.name: Bear Trap
bear trap.desc: Landing a hit with your critical makes your opponent unable to jump for a duration. Also slows your opponent.

blade dancer.name: Blade Dancer
blade dancer.desc: Landing an M1 removes your roll cooldown.

spinning swordsman.name: Spinning Swordsman
spinning swordsman.desc: Running attacks do 15% extra damage when you have a speed boost.

cheap trick.name: Cheap Trick
cheap trick.desc: When hit below half health briefly disappear leaving behind an illusion clone to keep your opponent occupied. Briefly disappear after knocking an enemy.

oath: visionshaper.name: Oath: Visionshaper
oath: visionshaper.desc: You vow to only see that which you wish to see. Reality itself is malleable, pliable to your deft hands.

reality shift.name: Reality Shift
reality shift.desc: Command the closest conjured servant to attack their hallucinating target, using either a Critical Attack or a Mantra.

shaper mimicry.name: Shaper Mimicry
shaper mimicry.desc: The servants you have conjured will imitate your actions when you Swing/Block/Parry/Jump.

encore.name: Encore
encore.desc: Your Sing now stun opponents who are already charmed.

propagandist.name: Propagandist
propagandist.desc: Your Sing will now stir your allies into a frenzy, causing them to become Overcharmed for 15s, applying Charmed to enemies they hit with basic attacks.

command: live.name: Command: Live
command: live.desc: Once per hour, command a servant to defy all odds and obey your command - live.

command: summon.name: Command: Summon
command: summon.desc: Command your servant to obey your master and appear before you no matter the distance.

vow of mastery.name: Vow of Mastery
vow of mastery.desc: The Vow of Mastery grants the Master the power to command their Subject. To initiate a vow, you must ask the other player if they'd like to make the vow.e.g."wanna make a vow of mastery?"

chronostasis.name: Chronostasis
chronostasis.desc: Landing an M1 or Critical Strike now puts target resonance on cooldown for a short duration.

critical attack.name: Critical Attack
critical attack.desc: Landing a hit with your critical restores 30% Posture.

reqs.from: Complete the Megalodaunt Quest in Towerstruck Lands

engage.name: Engage
engage.desc: Landing an M1 slightly restores some of your Ether.

reqs.from: Complete the Megalodaunt Quest in Towerstruck Lands

scuba drowner.name: Scuba Drowner
scuba drowner.desc: You won't always drown to death when downed in water.

conditioned swimmer.name: Conditioned Swimmer
conditioned swimmer.desc: You lose less hunger and thirst while swimming.

switchblade [hvy].name: Switchblade [HVY]
switchblade [hvy].desc: You can now utilise Dagger talents when not wielding a dagger.

switchblade [med].name: Switchblade [MED]
switchblade [med].desc: You can now utilise Dagger talents when not wielding a dagger.

showstopper.name: Showstopper
showstopper.desc: When an enemy would roll through one of your physical attacks, stomp the ground, dazing anyone nearby. Removes speed buffs from target upon landing.

brutal momentum.name: Brutal Momentum
brutal momentum.desc: [Greatswords/Greathammers] Successfully dodging will give you hyperarmour on your next swing.

matador.name: Matador
matador.desc: Deal +20% more damage to human enemies with hyperarmor.

warrior's swing.name: Warrior's Swing
warrior's swing.desc: Reduces incoming damage if hit during Heavy swing hyper armor.

mercy kill.name: Mercy Kill
mercy kill.desc: When you flourish an enemy much weaker than you, you kill them instantly. Enemies that are greatly weaker than you die instantly from a single hit.

reqs.from: Uncap a Weapon or an Attunement stat

haunted gale.name: Haunted Gale
haunted gale.desc: Every 3 hits landed by perfectly casted Galebreathe mantras will cause the target to be quickly struck by a phantom of wind.

winter's presebce.name: Winter's Presebce
winter's presebce.desc: Your tightly-bound winter gear negates elemental damage buffs from weather on damage against you. Also seems to provide some resistance to the Gale.
